detail_desc: Sandals with a braided section at the front and an ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening at one side. Imitation leather insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Poncho in a soft weave with a fringed hem.

Leggings in stretch imitation leather with a low waist, extended waistband with a concealed button, and fly with a visible zip. Fake pockets with decorative zips at the front and quilted details on the knees.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Push-up bra in mesh with underwired, moulded, lace-covered, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastener at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. High waist, zip fly and hook-and-eye fasteners. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs with creases.
Clamdiggers in washed denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and a leg pocket. Key chain with a carabiner hook.

Short dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and V-shaped opening at the front. Small opening with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, and long, wide balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front, long sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a high slit in one side. Unlined.
Loose-fitting T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and linen blend. V-neck, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and short slits at the hem.
Wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Print motif and reflective details on the legs.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Single-breasted, oversized jacket in woven fabric with wide notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Concealed fastening at the front and cuffs. Lined.
Soft, double-layered hairband with a decorative wrapover detail at the front.
Top in ribbed organic cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with studs at the sides and a zip fly and button.
Short lace dress with a V-neck front and back, a concealed zip at the back and long sleeves. Seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Hooded top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a raw-edge hem.
Block-coloured T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with a text print on one sleeve, ribbing around the neckline, a small fabric appliqué at the hem and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a frill at the top, high waist, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders.
Swim shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Dress in soft tulle with a metallic print, short, frilled sleeves and buttons at the back of the neck. Lined.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short cap sleeves.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilation holes under the arms, ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. Size of chest pocket 10x17.5 cm.
Vest top in soft linen jersey with a deep V-neck front and back.
V-neck T-shirts in soft jersey.

Jacket in washed, stretch cotton denim with an embroidered motif on the chest and a large, embroidered appliqué on the back. Sleeves in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with quilted elbow patches and ribbed cuffs. Collar, press-studs down the front and fake chest pockets with a flap and press-stud. Unlined.
Treggings in sturdy stretch jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Short, wide T-shirt in soft cotton jersey. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Knee-length coat in a brushed weave with narrow notch lapels, a concealed press-stud fastening, dropped shoulders and flap front pockets. Tape-trimmed inner seams. Unlined.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Twill cap with a print motif on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Long zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with quilted sections and wide elastication at the cuffs.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft, patterned viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Knee-high boots in suede with pointed toes. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 9 cm.
Calf-length skirt in silk crêpe. High waist with covered elastication.
Sturdy trainers in nylon and suede with a padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Mesh linings, leather insoles and chunky rubber soles.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a wrapover front and press-studs at one side and at the crotch. Trousers with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a motif.
Non-wired push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and no fasteners.

Two-button jacket in a small checked weave containing some wool with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply, which combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Short parka in cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. Flap front pockets with a pleat and press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and hem, a tab and concealed press stud at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Pile lining.
Bustier in a jacquard weave with underwired, lined, shaped cups, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, smocking and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined.
Spotted elastic braces with metal fasteners.
Bohemian blouse in a soft cotton weave with elastication and a broderie anglaise flounce at the top.
A-line blouse in an airy, patterned cotton weave with elastication around the top and short, flounced, raglan sleeves.

Super push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Knee-length shorts in a cotton weave with a button fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.

Padded ski trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams at critical points. Reinforced at the knees, hems and back. Zip fly and press-stud, zipped side pockets, a back pocket with a button, and detachable, adjustable elastic braces. Lined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Calf-length dress in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend a round neckline, short sleeves and flared skirt. Unlined.

Strapless balconette bra in lace with underwired, padded cups that lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top of the back, additional support at the sides and front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. V-shaped back so that the bra can be worn under low-cut garments.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle decorated with beads. Width 3.5 cm.
Short A-line skirt.
Straight-cut blouse in cotton poplin with long puff sleeves and a round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Frill trim around the sleeves and hem. Unlined.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned details and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back and a wide, ribbed hem. Light support.
Fully lined bikini top with triangular cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.

Jeans in soft, washed cotton denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Detachable, elastic braces with imitation leather details.
Jersey-lined trousers in soft cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. Adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, patch front pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and legs with side stripes and elasticated, ribbed hems.

Oversized, lightweight parka in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a drawstring hood and high stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, handwarmer pockets and flap front pockets with concealed press-studs. Drawstring at the waist and hem. Unlined.
Biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Diagonal, zipped chest pocket, zipped side pockets, an inner pocket and long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down to the waist and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a tiered skirt for added width. Unlined.
Fitted, long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft jersey.

Short jacket in patterned cotton twill with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and long sleeves with shaping seams and a button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with a decorative lace trim and bow at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
A pair of long metal earrings with hoops and rod-shaped pendants. Length 6.5 cm.
Short jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trunks in stretch jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
T-shirt in airy linen jersey. Relaxed fit with a V-neck.
